Test Steps:
1. Navigate to /register
2. Enter valid email: newuser@example.com
3. Enter password: password123
4. Enter confirm password: password123
5. Enter CCCD: 123456789012
6. Enter phone: 0987654321
7. Select role: BUYER
8. Click Register
Test Data:
Email: newuser@example.com
Password: password123
Confirm: password123
CCCD: 123456789012
Phone: 0987654321
Role: BUYER
Expected Result:
笨・No validation errors
笨・Loading state shown
笨・Redirect to /verify-email?email=newuser@example.com
笨・Success message
笨・Backend receives role: BUYER

Test Steps:
1. On verify email page
2. Check console for OTP (mock mode)
3. Enter correct OTP
4. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笨・Success: Email verified successfully!
笨・Redirect to /login after 2 seconds
笨・User isVerify = TRUE
笨・Response includes user object

Test Steps:
1. Enter wrong OTP: 111111
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笶・Error: Invalid OTP. Please try again.
笶・Console shows: Attempt 1/3
笶・User remains unverified

Test Steps:
1. Enter wrong OTP: 222222
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笶・Error: Invalid OTP. Please try again.
笶・Console shows: Attempt 2/3

Test Steps:
1. Enter wrong OTP: 333333
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笶・Error: Invalid OTP. Please try again.
笶・Console shows: 沐 OTP locked after 3 failed attempts

Test Steps:
1. Enter ANY OTP (even correct one)
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笶・Error: OTP is locked. Please request a new OTP.
笶・Cannot verify even with correct OTP

Test Steps:
1. Enter OTP: 12345 (5 digits)
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笶・Error: OTP must be 6 digits
笶・No API call made

Test Steps:
1. Leave OTP field empty
2. Click Verify Email
Expected Result: 笶・Error: OTP code is required

Test Steps:
1. Wait for OTP to expire (timer shows 0:00)
2. Enter OTP
3. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笶・Error: OTP expired. Please request a new OTP.
笶・Verify button disabled when timer = 0:00

Test Steps: 1. Click Resend OTP
Expected Result:
笨・Success: OTP has been resent to your email
笨・New OTP in console
笨・Cooldown timer starts (60s)
笨・Expiration timer resets to 2:00
笨・Old OTP invalidated
笨・Attempt counter reset to 0

Test Steps: 1. Click Resend OTP again immediately
Expected Result:
笶・Button disabled
笶・Shows countdown: Resend (59s), Resend (58s), etc.

Test Steps:
1. Wait for cooldown to finish
2. Click Resend OTP
Expected Result:
笨・New OTP sent
笨・Cooldown restarts
笨・Attempt counter reset

Test Steps:
1. Clear email field
2. Click Resend OTP
Expected Result: 笶・Error: Email is required

Test Steps:
1. OTP locked after 3 failures
2. Click Resend OTP
3. Enter new OTP from console
4. Click Verify Email
Expected Result:
笨・New OTP generated
笨・Attempt counter reset to 0
笨・Can verify with new OTP
笨・Success

Test Case Name: Register 竊・Skip Verify 竊・Try Login
Precondition: User just registered but not verified

2. Skip verification (go to login)
3. Try to login
Expected Result:
笶・Login blocked
笶・Error: Please verify your email before logging in

Test Case Name: Register 竊・OTP Locked 竊・Resend 竊・Success
Test Steps:
1. Register new user
2. Enter wrong OTP 3 times
3. Try correct OTP (locked)
4. Click Resend OTP
5. Enter new OTP
6. Verify successfully
Expected Result:
笨・OTP locks after 3 failures
笨・Resend unlocks
笨・Verification succeeds with new OTP
